noHotStreakPlayers: No players on a hot streak at the moment.
currentHotStreakExplanation: ðŸ”¥ Current Hot Streak: This shows the players who are currently on a winning streak. The number indicates how many consecutive matches they've won without losing. Keep an eye on these players - they're on fire!
historicalHotStreakExplanation: ðŸ‘‘ Historical Hot Streak: This displays the players who have achieved the longest winning streaks in the past. The number represents their best streak ever. These players have proven they can dominate!
levelSystemDescription: The level system is designed to reflect your progress and experience in the game. It provides a clear path for growth and recognition of your achievements.
levelProgressionDescription: You start at level 0 and can progress up to level 100. Every 5 levels, you reach a new rank with a unique name and color scheme. This visual progression helps you and others quickly recognize your experience level.
xpGainDescription:
You earn XP through various activities:
â€¢ Playing matches
â€¢ Winning games and sets
â€¢ Completing challenges
â€¢ Participating in tournaments
â€¢ Improving your skills in practice sessions
noviceDesc: Just starting out, learning the basics (Levels 0-4)
supremeDesc: Attaining the highest level of mastery (Levels 70-74)
mythicDesc: Becoming a living legend in the game (Levels 75-79)
cosmicDesc: Reaching a universal level of greatness (Levels 90-94)
failedFetchUserCommunity: Failed to fetch user community. Please try again.
failedFetchProfiles: Failed to fetch profiles. Please try again.
noTopPlayers: No top players to show at the moment.
startPlayingPrompt: Start playing to see your name here!
monthlyTopPlayersExplanation: Monthly top players are determined based on their performance in matches played this month. We consider the number of wins and total matches played within the current month.
overallTopPlayersExplanation: Overall top players are determined based on their total performance. We consider the total number of wins and matches played since joining the community.
rankingExplanation: Players are ranked based on their win rate, with total wins as a tiebreaker. This ensures that both consistency and volume of play are rewarded.
keepPlayingPrompt: Keep playing and improving your game to see your name climb up the rankings!
name: Enrique Robles

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Enrique Robles, also known as Quique Robles, is a telecommunications engineer and software developer with a great passion for technology and space communications. With a solid background in Telecommunications Engineering and Computer Engineering, Enrique has dedicated his career to learning and developing new techniques and devices to advance as a society.

education.title: Education
education.details:
â€¢ Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Signal Processing, Telecommunication Systems, and Space Communications at Politecnico di Milano.
â€¢ Graduated with honors in Telecommunications Engineering from Universidad CEU San Pablo.
â€¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, including a one-year stay at Politecnico di Milano.

urbpaddle.title: Qourtify
urbpaddle.description: A comprehensive mobile application for managing paddle tennis communities. Features include court booking, player matching, and community management.

cubesat.title: CubeSat TMTC Subsystem
cubesat.description: Development of the Telemetry and Telecommand (TMTC) subsystem for CubeSat missions, ensuring reliable communication for satellite systems.

meteorologicalAntenna.title: Meteorological Satellite Antenna
meteorologicalAntenna.description: Design and manufacture of antennas for receiving images from meteorological satellites using CST Studio.

postQuantum.title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Implementation
postQuantum.description: Implementation of post-quantum cryptography algorithms for ensuring the integrity and confidentiality of communications in European satellites during an internship at GMV.

introDescription1: Qourtify is the ultimate platform for paddle tennis communities. Book, play, and grow your passion for the sport.
introTitle2: Put your community on the radar
introDescription2: Statistics, competition, and fun. Qourtify offers everything you need to take your community to the next level.
introDescription3: Create a profile for your paddle tennis community. Manage courts, residents and guests.
communityRegistrationSuccess: Your community registration has been sent successfully. We'll review it and get back to you soon.
introductionText: Welcome to the Padel Reservations App. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you use our app.
dataCollectionText1: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you register for our app. We also gather data about your padel reservations, playing preferences, and app usage patterns.
dataCollectionText2: Additionally, we may collect technical information about your device, including IP address, operating system, and app version to improve our service and troubleshoot issues.
dataUseText1: We use your data to manage reservations, improve our services, and send notifications related to your padel activities. This includes processing payments, sending booking confirmations, and providing customer support.
dataUseText2: We may also use your data to personalize your experience, recommend courts or playing partners, and send you promotional offers related to padel.
dataSharingText: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted partners who assist us in operating our app, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
dataProtectionText1: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. This includes using encryption for data transmission and secure servers for data storage.
dataProtectionText2: While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
userRightsText1: You have the right to access, rectify, cancel, and object to the processing of your personal data. You can exercise these rights by contacting us through the information provided in the contact section.
userRightsText2: You may also request a copy of your data or ask for it to be deleted, subject to any legal requirements that may oblige us to retain certain information.
cookiesText1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience, analyze app usage, and assist in our marketing efforts.
cookiesText2: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our app.
thirdPartyServicesText1: Our app may use third-party services for payment processing, analytics, or other functions. These services have their own privacy policies and may collect and use your information according to their terms.
thirdPartyServicesText2: We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these third-party services to understand how they handle your data.
minorsText: Our app is not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
changesText: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon their posting on the app. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes.
contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at: privacy@padelreservationsapp.com or by mail at: Padel Reservations App, Calle Principal 123, 28001 Madrid, Spain.
